00030 #ifndef OCTREE_HEADER_INCLUDED
00031 #define OCTREE_HEADER_INCLUDED
00032 
00033 #include <types.H>
00034 #include <cstring>
00035 #include <vector>
00036 #include <string_basics.H>
00037 
00038 template<typename _Tp, typename _Sequence = std::vector<_Tp> >
00039 class octree_data_t{
00040 public:
00041   //typedef typename _Sequence::value_type              value_type;
00042   //typedef typename _Sequence::reference               reference;
00043   //typedef typename _Sequence::const_reference         const_reference;
00044   //typedef typename _Sequence::iterator                iterator;
00045   //typedef typename _Sequence::const_iterator          const_iterator;
00046   //typedef typename _Sequence::size_type               size_type;
00047   //typedef typename _Sequence::iterator::iterator_category iterator_category;
00048   typedef          _Sequence                          container_type;
00049 
00050   octree_data_t()
00051   {
00052     a_head = 0;
00053     std::memset(a_children, 0, 8 * sizeof(octree_data_t*));
00054     std::memset(a_box_min, 0, 3*my_float_size);
00055     std::memset(a_box_max, 0, 3*my_float_size);
00056     std::memset(a_centroid, 0, 3*my_float_size);
00057   }
00058 
00062   octree_data_t(octree_data_t& src)
00063   {
00064     if(this == &src) return;
00065 
00066     a_head = src.a_head;
00067     std::copy(src.a_children, src.a_children + 8, a_children);
00068     std::copy(src.a_box_min, src.a_box_min + 3, a_box_min);
00069     std::copy(src.a_box_max, src.a_box_max + 3, a_box_max);
00070     std::copy(src.a_centroid, src.a_centroid + 3, a_centroid);
00071     a_data = src.a_data; 
00072   }
00073 
00074   octree_data_t* a_head;
00075   octree_data_t* a_children[8];
00076   my_float_t a_box_min[3];    
00077   my_float_t a_box_max[3];    
00078   my_float_t a_centroid[3];
00079 
00080   container_type a_data; 
00081 private:
00082 };
00083 
00085 
00088 template<typename _Tp, typename _Sequence = std::vector<_Tp> >
00089 class Octree{
00090 public:
00091   typedef typename _Sequence::value_type              value_type;
00092   //typedef typename _Sequence::reference               reference;
00093   typedef typename _Sequence::const_reference         const_reference;
00094   //typedef typename _Sequence::iterator                iterator;
00095   typedef typename _Sequence::const_iterator          const_iterator;
00096   //typedef typename _Sequence::size_type               size_type;
00097   //typedef typename _Sequence::iterator::iterator_category iterator_category;
00098   typedef          _Sequence                          container_type;
00099 
00100   Octree(/*const uint max_nsubdiv,*/ const my_float_t min_side_len,
00101          const uint max_numel = 10)
00102   {
00103     //a_max_nsubdiv = max_nsubdiv;
00104     a_min_side_len = min_side_len;
00105     a_max_numel = max_numel;
00106   }
00107 
00108 
00114   void
00115   build(const my_float_t* positions_begin, const my_float_t* postions_end,
00116         const my_float_t* centroid, const my_float_t root_side_len,
00117         const container_type& data)
00118   {
00119     a_root_side_len = root_side_len; 
00120     std::copy(centroid, centroid + 3, a_root.a_centroid);
00121     std::vector<uint> idz(data.size());
00122     uint i = 0;
00123     for(const_iterator r = data.begin(); r != data.end(); ++r, ++i){   
00124       a_root.a_data.push_back(r);
00125       idz[i] = i;
00126     }
00127     subdivide(&a_root, idz, positions_begin, a_root_side_len); 
00128   }
00129 
00130   void 
00131   subdivide(octree_data_t<const_iterator>* cnode, 
00132             const std::vector<uint>& idz, const my_float_t* positions_begin,
00133             const my_float_t side_len)
00134   {
00135     std::cout << "side_len is " << side_len << std::endl;
00136     std::cout << "number of elements in cube is " << cnode->a_data.size() << std::endl;
00137 
00138     my_float_t h_width = 0.5 * side_len;
00139     if(h_width <= a_min_side_len) return;
00140  
00141     std::vector< std::vector<uint> > idz_vec(8);
00142     my_float_t* centroid = cnode->a_centroid;
00143   
00144     // partition based on the position of each point 
00145     uint cube_idx;
00146     for(uint i = 0; i < cnode->a_data.size(); ++i){
00147       const my_float_t* pos = positions_begin + 3*idz[i];
00148       cube_idx = (pos[0] > centroid[0] ? 0 : 1); 
00149       cube_idx += (pos[1] > centroid[1] ? 0 : 2); 
00150       cube_idx += (pos[2] > centroid[2] ? 0 : 4); 
00151   
00152       // add to smaller cube
00153       octree_data_t<const_iterator>* child = *(cnode->a_children + cube_idx);
00154       if(!child){
00155         *(cnode->a_children + cube_idx) = new octree_data_t<const_iterator>;
00156         child = *(cnode->a_children + cube_idx);
00157         child->a_head = cnode;
00158         uint mask = 1; 
00159         for(uint j = 0; j < 3; ++j, mask <<= 1)
00160           child->a_centroid[j] = (cube_idx & mask ? centroid[j] - h_width : 
00161                                                     centroid[j] + h_width);
00162       }
00163       idz_vec[cube_idx].push_back(idz[i]);
00164       child->a_data.push_back(cnode->a_data[i]); 
00165     }
00166 
00167     // Parent is not leaf node so clear its data
00168     cnode->a_data.clear();
00169     for(uint i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
00170       if(idz_vec[i].size() > a_max_numel) 
00171         subdivide(cnode->a_children[i], idz_vec[i], positions_begin, h_width);
00172   }
00173 
00174   void 
00175   near_by_points(const my_float_t* pos, const my_float_t max_dist, 
00176                  std::vector<const_iterator>* pts)
00177   {
00178     uint cube_idx;
00179     const my_float_t* centroid = a_root.a_centroid;
00180     my_float_t side_len = a_root_side_len;
00181     octree_data_t<const_iterator>* cnode = &a_root;
00182     while(side_len > max_dist){
00183       cube_idx = (pos[0] > centroid[0] ? 0 : 1);
00184       cube_idx += (pos[1] > centroid[1] ? 0 : 2);
00185       cube_idx += (pos[2] > centroid[2] ? 0 : 4);
00186  
00187       if(cnode->a_children[cube_idx] == 0) break;
00188       cnode = cnode->a_children[cube_idx];
00189             
00190         
00191       side_len *= 0.5;
00192     }
00193 
00194     pts->clear();
00195     get_pts(cnode, pts);
00196   }
00197 
00198 private:
00199   void
00200   get_pts(const octree_data_t<const_iterator>* cnode, 
00201           std::vector<const_iterator>* pts)
00202   {
00203     bool leaf = true;
00204     for(uint i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
00205       if(cnode->a_children[i]){
00206         leaf = false;
00207         get_pts(cnode->a_children[i], pts);
00208       }     
00209 
00210     if(!leaf) return;
00211     
00212     for(uint i = 0; i < cnode->a_data.size(); ++i)
00213       pts->push_back(cnode->a_data[i]);
00214   } 
00215 
00216   octree_data_t<const_iterator> a_root;
00217   my_float_t a_root_side_len;
00218   uint a_max_numel; 
00219 //  uint a_max_nsubdiv;  //!< Maximum level of splitting 
00220   
00221   //my_float_t a_box_min[3];   //!< Min corner of root cube
00222   //my_float_t a_box_max[3];   //!< Max corner of root cube
00223   my_float_t a_min_side_len; 
00224 
00225   static const std::string a_fname;
00226 };
